title: ui: Add execution history timeline panel

files_created.description: Collapsible panel component showing execution history with timestamps, per-node results, and click-to-select functionality

changes: Added ExecutionHistoryPanel to layout between canvas and SelectedNodePanel

features.collapsible_panel: Panel can be collapsed/expanded via header click
features.run_list: Shows list of run records with timestamps (newest first)
features.expandable_runs: Each run can be expanded to show per-node results
features.click_to_select: Clicking on a node in history selects it in the canvas
features.status_indicators: Shows success/failure status with color-coded badges
features.elapsed_time: Shows relative time (just now, Xm ago, Xh ago, Xd ago)
features.empty_state: Shows friendly message when no executions exist
